amendment.description: Amendment deleted section 305 which guaranteed special television media rates for advertising for political candidates.
amendment.purpose: Amendment numbered 11 printed in the Congressional Record of February 12, 2002 to strike any bill language regarding preferential television advertising rates for candidates and parties.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Green (TX) amendment (A005) Agreed to by recorded vote: 327 - 101 (Roll no. 23).
